name: Research Assistant
description: A helpful research agent that assists with information gathering and analysis tasks. This agent uses secure protocols and follows best practices.

skills.name: search_documents
skills.description: Search through indexed documents and return relevant results

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

skills.name: summarize_text
skills.description: Generate a concise summary of provided text

max_length.description: Maximum length of summary in words

skills.name: fact_check
skills.description: Verify claims against trusted knowledge sources
